Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People on social media in Australia are actively discussing their views on the upcoming federal budget. Members of the Women's Economic Equality Taskforce and other Australians concerned with financial inequality and social welfare are calling for increased government action claiming that the proposed tax cuts are costly and could be better spent elsewhere. Additionally there are questions about whether the news reported by certain media sources is reliable and whether the government should be taking advice from international financial institutions. However there are some more celebratory posts showing appreciation for those working to address these concerns.
